expo.name: weather

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use our current location to get weather information, so we are essentially accessing your location. Please allow the app to access your location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We use our current location to get weather information, so we are essentially accessing your location. Please allow the app to access your location.

expo.description: The nice weather - Location Based Weather Information System.
